mapper.insert: insert into TB_USER (USER_ID, UUID, USER_EMAIL, USER_GENDER, USER_BIRTH, USER_GRADE, CREATED_BY, CREATED, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED) values (#{userid}, #{uuid}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{grade}, #{email}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{email}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )
mapper.select: select UUID, USER_EMAIL from TB_USER where USER_EMAIL=#{email}
